statements: SELECT * FROM fire_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, location FROM fire_incidents WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM fire_incidents WHERE location = 'Office Building';
SELECT incident_id, location, coordinator_id FROM fire_incidents WHERE coordinator_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT description FROM fire_incidents WHERE location LIKE '%House%';
SELECT incident_id, location FROM fire_incidents WHERE incident_date='2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM fire_incidents WHERE location='New York' AND incident_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT incident_date, description FROM fire_incidents WHERE location='California' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, description, coordinator_id FROM fire_incidents WHERE incident_date>'2022-09-01' AND location='Texas';
SELECT * FROM fire_incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM incidents;
SELECT incident_id, description, location, date FROM incidents;
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM emergency_teams;
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE location = 'City A';
SELECT team_name, location FROM emergency_teams ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM incidents ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location, description FROM incidents WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM incidents INNER JOIN emergency_teams ON incidents.location = emergency_teams.location;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(incident_id) AS total_incidents FROM emergency_teams LEFT JOIN incidents ON emergency_teams.location = incidents.location GROUP BY team_name ORDER BY total_incidents DESC;
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE description LIKE '%fire%' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM FireIncidents;
SELECT incident_date, location FROM FireIncidents WHERE severity > 3;
SELECT team_name, team_lead, team_members FROM EmergencyResponseTeams;
SELECT * FROM IncidentReport WHERE report_datetime >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT i.incident_date, t.team_name, r.report_description FROM FireIncidents i JOIN IncidentReport r ON i.incident_id = r.incident_id JOIN EmergencyResponseTeams t ON r.team_id = t.team_id;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, location, severity FROM FireIncidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_lead, team_members FROM EmergencyResponseTeams WHERE team_members > 5;
SELECT report_id, report_description, report_datetime FROM IncidentReport WHERE report_datetime > '2021-01-01';
SELECT incident_id, location, severity FROM FireIncidents WHERE severity >= 3 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT report_id, incident_id, team_id, report_description FROM IncidentReport WHERE team_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM fire_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, location FROM fire_incidents;
SELECT team_name, team_leader, team_size FROM emergency_teams;
SELECT team_id, status FROM team_status;
SELECT incident_id, team_id, assignment_date FROM team_assignments;
SELECT * FROM fire_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, location FROM fire_incidents WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT team_name, team_leader, team_size FROM emergency_teams ORDER BY team_size DESC;
SELECT incident_id, team_name, assignment_date FROM team_assignments INNER JOIN emergency_teams ON team_assignments.team_id = emergency_teams.team_id;
SELECT team_name, status, last_updated FROM emergency_teams JOIN team_status ON emergency_teams.team_id = team_status.team_id WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM IncidentDetails;
SELECT incident_location, incident_date FROM IncidentDetails WHERE incident_description LIKE '%fire%';
SELECT incident_id, incident_description FROM IncidentDetails ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_leader FROM EmergencyTeams WHERE team_contact_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT team_name, response_time, response_status FROM RespondingTeams WHERE response_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM IncidentDetails
SELECT incident_date, incident_location FROM IncidentDetails WHERE incident_location = 'City Hall'
SELECT team_name, team_leader, team_contact_number FROM EmergencyTeams ORDER BY team_name DESC
SELECT * FROM RespondingTeams WHERE response_status = 'Dispatched' ORDER BY response_time ASC
SELECT member_name, member_contact_number FROM TeamMembers INNER JOIN EmergencyTeams ON TeamMembers.team_id = EmergencyTeams.team_id
